page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = httpd_server_restart([L confirm [,L raise_errors [,L use_registry_settings ]]])

argument.name: confirm
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. (FALSE). If .T. (TRUE) prompts the user to confirm the restart.

argument.name: raise_errors
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. (FALSE). If .T. (TRUE) raises error messages in error boxes.

argument.name: use_registry_settings
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. (FALSE). If .T. (TRUE) uses user preferences. If .T. (TRUE), the user can choose to suppress the automatic confirmation dialog that appears.

return.name: Result_Flag
return.description: .T. = Server successfully restarted. .F. = Server not restarted.

page.discussion: The HTTPD_SERVER_RESTART() function restarts the Application Server.
